paragraphs: I haven't eaten solid food for three days. It is the penance I offer the Dark One for my lack of faith. I should've never revealed my doubts to Reggr. He went right to Vila. I'm surprised Vila didn't kill me outright for my insolence and blasphemy. Others in our group have not been so lucky. They tried to hide the bodies, but I saw them. Every one appears to have died screaming.
